name: Empty Room
entry_text: There doesn't seem to be anything here.

name: Locked Chest
entry_text: You find an elaborate chest, with ??? jewels gleaming on every edge. It is locked.

name: Arrow Trap
entry_text: As you enter the room, your ankle gets hooked on a tripwire and arrows shoot at you.

name: Feast
entry_text: You find a lavish feast worthy of a king laid out, with no one else in sight.

name: Fountain
entry_text: There is a serene fountain gently bubbling nearby.

name: Guest Room
entry_text: You find a guest bedroom, with a comfy-looking bed.
